analysisEngineMetaData.name: de.tudarmstadt.lt.teaching.nlp4web.ml.postagger.AnalyzeFeatures
analysisEngineMetaData.description: This class analaysis the classification result and prints the precision and recall for each pos tag and prints the average precision and recall for all pos tags and the accuracy
analysisEngineMetaData.copyright: Copyright 2010 Ubiquitous Knowledge Processing (UKP) Lab Technische Universit√§t Darmstadt

configurationParameter.name: TokenValuePath
configurationParameter.description: To make this class general, the path to the feature that is used for the evaluation the tokenValuePath has to be set to the feature e.g. for the pos value: pos/PosValue is used (works only for token: de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.segmentation.type.Token)
